title: Fat/Weight Loss
description: Focus on reducing body fat through a combination of cardio, strength training, and a balanced diet.

title: Muscle/Strength Gain
description: Aim to increase muscle mass with targeted strength training and a protein-rich diet.

title: Endurance Building
description: Build cardiovascular endurance with activities like running, cycling, and swimming.

title: Mobility Improvement
description: Enhance flexibility and joint health through stretching, yoga, and mobility exercises.

title: physicotherapy
description: Recover from injuries and improve physical function with tailored therapy exercises.

title: General Fitness
description: Maintain overall health and fitness with a balanced routine of cardio, strength, and flexibility exercises.
